title: Joblane - Job-Portal Website
description: A full-stack job application portal that enables users to search, save, and filter jobs by category. Users can upload their resumes, manage their profiles, and track the status of applied jobs. The platform includes an admin feature for managing job application statuses and user accounts, as well as posting new job listings on the website.

title: Smart AI Research Assistant
description: An AI-powered research assistant that integrates OpenAI GPT-4, Pinecone, and MongoDB Atlas to help users upload documents, perform semantic searches, and get real-time insights. Built with Node.js, Express.js, React.js, and Python, it supports secure session management, analytics tracking, and a responsive UI for efficient research workflows.

title: CodeEditor - Web-Based Code Editor
description: A powerful web-based code editor with an integrated terminal and real-time output. Users can write, run, and test Python code directly in the browser with syntax highlighting and secure backend execution using Docker. The backend is deployed on AWS EC2 for robust performance and scalability.

title: BlogWiz - Blogging Platform
description: A blogging platform website with a sleek and user-friendly interface, allowing users to write articles, upload pictures, edit their articles, delete them as needed, and search through different blogs of other users. The platform includes authentication, login, and registration features.

title: News-Mate
description: This project is a React + Tailwind CSS frontend for an AI-powered news chatbot that utilizes Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). The chatbot allows users to ask questions and receive answers based on a collection of news articles. The application connects to the backend, which processes user queries and returns relevant information from the articles, enabling an interactive and dynamic conversation.

title: Ecommerce
description: This project is a Frontend E-Commerce Application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It provides a seamless user experience for browsing products, adding items to a shopping cart, and proceeding to checkout. The application allows users to view product details, manage cart contents, and see the final total for payment before completing the purchase process.

title: Sorting-Algorithm
description: This project is a JavaScript-based tool that visually demonstrates sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Quick Sort, and Merge Sort. It allows users to observe the sorting process in real time, helping to better understand how these algorithms work.

title: Weather Application
description: A weather application that provides weather-related data for any city in the world in Celsius and Fahrenheit. It utilizes the OpenWeather API to fetch weather information for cities and dynamically changes the background image according to the weather conditions. The application boasts a beautiful interface for an enhanced user experience.
